query:
SELECT id, status, triggered_by, started_at, finished_at, duration_ms, error_message 
FROM execution_runs 
ORDER BY started_at DESC 
LIMIT 5;

SELECT el.run_id, el.level, el.message, el.created_at 
FROM execution_logs el
WHERE el.run_id = (SELECT id FROM execution_runs ORDER BY started_at DESC LIMIT 1)
ORDER BY el.created_at ASC;
